item.title: Read from hdfs with R. Brief overview of SparkR.
item.author: selivanov.dmitriy@gmail.com (Dmitriy Selivanov)
item.description: Disclaimer: originally I planned to write post about R functions/packages which allow to read data from hdfs (with benchmarks), but in the end it became more like an overview of SparkR capabilities. Nowadays working with “big data” almost always means working with hadoop ecosystem. A few years ago this also meant that you also would have to be a good java programmer to work in such environment - even simple word count program took several dozens of lines of code.
